actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to the killing of over 1,000 porpoise by Japanese fishermen in February 1978 and calling for a halt of this practice.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to the killing of porpoise by Japanese fishermen in February 1978, and calling for a halt of such practice.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to the killing of over 1,000 porpoise by Japanese fishermen in February 1978 and calling for a halt of this practice.
